title: Himi 54
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko eni ke mou fa’a fai
Pea tokonaki,
Homou potu ke hū ki ai
Pea ungaki’i.
2.
’I tu’a ‘i he fa’itoka
Pea mama’o atu,
Mei he mālohi ‘o heli,
Ke tau malu ai.
3.
Ke hao ‘a e laumālie
Mei he faka’auha,
Pea ke tau siofia
‘A e ngata’anga.
4.
He vakai, ko e fu’u Maka
Tu’u ta’engata,
Kuo fahi ua ia
Kia kitautolu,
5.
‘Oku tau hoko ‘o ‘ilo
‘I he’etau tui,
‘A e potu ‘i ‘olunga
‘O e maka lahi.
6.
‘I he malu ‘o e ‘ofa
‘O ‘ene pekia,
Pea tau nofo ma’u ai pē
Ke tau malu ‘ia. *
